verses.text: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* what \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Xerxes, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H4427"\w* 127 \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w India|strong="H1912"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes \w sat|strong="H7675"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w citadel|strong="H1002"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, Xerxes \w held|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* military \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w*, \w along|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nobles|strong="H6579"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* 180 \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w displayed|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* magnificent \w splendor|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w end|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w held|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seven-day \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w citadel|strong="H1002"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w*, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w least|strong="H6996"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w*.

Hangings \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w white|strong="H2353"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* fastened \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w white|strong="H2353"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w purple|strong="H8504"\w* material \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w rings|strong="H1550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w marble|strong="H8336"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*. \w Gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w couches|strong="H4296"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* arranged \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mosaic|strong="H7531"\w* \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* porphyry, \w marble|strong="H8336"\w*, \w mother-of-pearl|strong="H1858"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* other costly \w stones|strong="H7531"\w*.

Beverages \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w served|strong="H8248"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w an|strong="H4428"\w* array \w of|strong="H4428"\w* goblets \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, each \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* different design, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* flowed freely, \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w bounty|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* order \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w no|strong="H6213"\w* limit \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w placed|strong="H3245"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8360"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w official|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* serve \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w desired|strong="H7522"\w*.

\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* women \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w merry|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* ordered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w served|strong="H8334"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*—\w Mehuman|strong="H4104"\w*, Biztha, \w Harbona|strong="H2726"\w*, Bigtha, Abagtha, \w Zethar|strong="H2242"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Carkas|strong="H3752"\w*—

\w to|strong="H6440"\w* bring \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, wearing \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w crown|strong="H3804"\w*, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w display|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w*, however, \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3985"\w* \w come|strong="H2534"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w command|strong="H1697"\w* \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w became|strong="H1697"\w* \w furious|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* within \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* consulted \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* customary \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* confer \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* experts \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w law|strong="H1881"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w justice|strong="H1779"\w*.

\w His|strong="H6440"\w* closest advisors \w were|strong="H8269"\w* \w Carshena|strong="H3771"\w*, \w Shethar|strong="H8369"\w*, Admatha, \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, \w Meres|strong="H4825"\w*, \w Marsena|strong="H4826"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w personal|strong="H6440"\w* \w access|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ranked highest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.

“\w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w law|strong="H1881"\w*,” \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w*, since \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w obey|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w* replied, “\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w wronged|strong="H5753"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w conduct|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w become|strong="H3318"\w* \w known|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* women, causing \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* despise \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes ordered \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w*.’

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* noble women \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*’s \w conduct|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, resulting \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w much|strong="H1697"\w* contempt \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w decree|strong="H1881"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w laws|strong="H1881"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w repealed|strong="H5674"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w* \w enter|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w position|strong="H4438"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w edict|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* issues \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w vast|strong="H1419"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*—\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* women, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w least|strong="H6996"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w*, \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w*; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w* advised.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w script|strong="H3791"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w should|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w master|strong="H8323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.
